NileEdge Innovations was founded by Aondona M. Iorumbur (Founder, CEO & Director of AI & Data Science Department) and Richard Adeyemi (Co-Founder & Director of Software Engineering Department).
what are the services under data science

Data Science at NileEdge Innovations offers the following services:
        - Data Analysis: Extract actionable insights from raw data to support evidence-based strategies and performance optimization.
        - Machine Learning: Develop and implement intelligent systems that learn from data and make predictions.
        - Data Visualization: Create interactive and informative visualizations of complex data sets to facilitate decision-making.
        - Data Engineering: Design, build, and maintain scalable and efficient data processing pipelines for large-scale data management.

NileEdge Innovations is a company focused on delivering intelligent, scalable solutions in AI, Data Science, Automation, and Medical AI. They offer their services to businesses, institutions, and individuals to help them unlock the value of data through innovation, smart engineering, and modern digital tools.

NileEdge Innovations is not a physical entity, so it doesn't have an opening or closing time. They are available to provide their services and support 24/7. If you have any specific inquiries or questions, you can reach out to their support team at any time, and they will be more than happy to assist you.
NileEdge has four main departments: AI & Data Science Department, Software Engineering Department, Data Analysis & Business Intelligence Department, and AI Agent & Automation Systems Department.

How do you implement medical AI
